---
id: financial-transaction-search-toscroll
title: "Financial transaction search (only more then 10,000 hits)"
description: "Use to search financial transactions. (use this operation to page through more than 10,000 hits. For less, use the /financial-transaction/search)"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Financial transaction search (only more then 10,000 hits)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/financial-transaction/search/to-scroll"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use to search financial transactions. (use this operation to page through more than 10,000 hits. For less, use the /financial-transaction/search)

After the search request, use scroll (/financial-transaction/search/scroll) to request the next batch of results. The time between each request must be less than 2 minutes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
